column5: had about 3 hrs to fish after my exam today. so i decided to visit a lake O trib and try my luck by myself.....  i was getting hits every other drift, but they were all palm size babies. i drifted a different seam and about 3 drifts later...BANG!!!  she took me up and down and into the logs...luckily i had the current to help me pull her out     after measuring the length of the rod after i got home..the fish was about 22-24" im guessing about 10lbs..she was FAT!!
Nice fish.  A giant for sure.   You could have said that better..
Great report and pics KelfuN  Nice looking Steel, congratulations and thanks for sharing Leechman
great catch, im surprised tribs are free of ice.
LmAo! Not a visual that I want to think of.  Did it take 3, 4 or 5 tries?  Soo sorry...  going to edit this post after, it must be the new meds...
Nice freshy....   LMAO      edit that before this post get's out of hand.....
Nice catch!  No, dont tell me you were using bagged red double-Jensen eggs!
Nice fish!  ... did u pass the exam?
Hell Yes ! Post exam fish.....nothing makes you feel free like that.  -R-
Congrats!! Nice looking fish,nice being able to catch fresh fish like that at Christmas time.  Backlash
Nice fish man, i still can't beleive people like yourself are going out into that cold fishing and still having great success.  Congrads & thanks for sharing
what? 22-24"?  O you mean the steelhead  Nice fish lol!
